item.title: Tenacity (Year of the Ox)
item.description: Week 6: Simple Love. This art was lovingly created using: Procreate. Artist’s Notes I thought I’d do a piece that describes the appreciation I have for the resilience of humankind through the struggles that we’ve faced this past year, and how that strength will continue into the next. Going for a Magic the Gathering vibe. Also, this is my first post so hello! Social Media N/A.
